channel.title: 8 on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in 8 on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0 Release Candidate Is Ready To Be Tested!
item.description: The maintainers team is pleased to announce the first release candidate of PrestaShop 8.0.

item.title: Migrate your solutions from PrestaShop 1.7 to 8.0
item.description: PrestaShop 8 beta version was released last week. If you are a developer in our ecosystem, create modules or themes, and have clients working with PrestaShop, this is an excellent opportunity to spend some time with this version and test your solutions.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0 beta is open for feedback!
item.description: The public beta version of PrestaShop 8.0 is now ready for you to test!
